track.name: Now That We've Found Love
comments: Introduced this cd to my students and the LOVE IT! especially this track. Music IS soothing to the soul.
super, super,super, ich kann iimmer wieder abtanzen

how can you NOT love this song?????

Happy, Happy, -love this extended version- good memories of London in the summer

COME ON BABY, WHEN THE MUSIC`S  PLAYING! I WANNA SEE YOU DANCE!!! I MUST SAY THAT EVERYONE SHOULD LIVE BY THIS LYRICS!!!!! FORGIVE AND FORGET, LET HATE BE YOUR ENEMY!!! WHEN YOU FIND LOVE SPREAD IT ALL OVER THE LAND/WORLD!!! JAH LOVE IS POWERFUL!!!;-))) PEACE TO YOU ALL!!
